name: ruby-ronn

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Ronn builds manuals. It converts simple, human readable textfiles to
roff for terminal display, and also to HTML for the web.

dependencies.name: ruby
dependencies.description:
A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity
and productivity.

dependencies.name: ruby-hpricot
dependencies.description:
A swift, liberal HTML parser with a fantastic library. NOTE: ruby-
hpricot is no longer maintained, consider ruby-nokogiri instead.

dependencies.name: ruby-mustache
dependencies.description:
Inspired by ctemplate and et, Mustache is a framework-agnostic way to
render logic-free views.

dependencies.name: ruby-rdiscount
dependencies.description: Fast Implementation of Gruber's Markdown in C.

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.
